venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
January Lean Workshop

6:30pm -  Early Bird Presentation: Customer Development 101

For those new to the concepts of Customer Development and The Lean Startup, we'll start the evening with a talk about the basics of customer development and lean startups at 6:30pm. Come to listen to the presentation, or hang out and network over pizza!

 

7:00pm - Using AARRR metrics and analytics to guide product decisions.

Matt Kaplan, VP Products, KnowledgeVision

Matt was a founding member of the management team at PermissionTV, an online video platform company that pioneered the use of video with interactivity. In his first startup, Matt co-founded AdValue Media Technologies, the first online exchange for television and radio advertising buyers and sellers. Matt earned his bachelor’s degree in mathematics with computer science from MIT.

 

Alex Kieft - VP Development, KnowledgeVision

Alex oversees the software development for KVStudio, KnowledgeVision’s advanced presentation authoring program. He is an accomplished Flash, Flex, and Javascript programmer, and is experienced at integrating KnowledgeVision with Online Video Platforms. Prior to becoming part of the founding team for KnowledgeVision, Alex worked as a Chief Media Architect for DigiNovations. Alex holds a Bachelor of Arts degree from Swarthmore College, where he studied French Literature and Film and Media Studies.
item.name: Lean Startup Circle Boston January Meetup
